doc.title: Resource Timing

value.content: Diagnosing performance issues requires performance data at the granularity of the resource. The Resource Timing API is a JavaScript API that is able to capture timing information for each individual resource that is fetched when a page is loaded.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Using the resource timing API
  • Server Timing
